name: Neon Marble Rust
description:
Neon Marble Rust is an upcoming Real-Time Strategy game.

Game Features:
3 Playable Factions
Neon, Marble, and Rust!
Online Multiplayer
2-State rollback system to improve moderate latency connections.
Quick Match (limited during Alpha), or custom rooms
Advanced economy system
3 resources that are mined off the map: Mana, Mojo, and Gold.
4 additional resources. These are crafted by your units.
Inspired by popular factory-simulation games, these replace the tech-requirements systems seen in other RTS games.
Strong macro-management will allow you to out-build your opponent!
Detailed combat
Varied unit abilities; skill-shots, stuns, teleports, and more!
Strong collisions between units - body-blocking is real.
Slow and long acceleration on unit movement, out maneuver your opponent for big plays!
Skill focus mechanics
Automation exists, but comes with a cost.
Unlock powerful management tools, but be careful: this research costs the same resource as defense!
Score-based Win Condition
Matches are limited to 20 minutes.
Destroy your opponent's Cores to score points.
Single-player
Sandbox mode to practice builds and test things out.
Harvest mode where you defend your base against waves of attackers.
10v10 mode where you can focus on controlling a small group of units.
Break-The-Targets mode to practice controlling a pair of units.
